sources.title: Rehearsal for Murder (1982) Jeff Goldblum, Robert Preston, Lynn Redgrave | Full Movie, subtitles
sources.description:
Where the curtain comes up on Terror!  A year after his fianc√©e's death, a playwright schedules a rehearsal for his new play, which proves to be a trap for her killer.

Original title: Rehearsal for Murder (1982)
Director: David Greene
Writers: Richard Levinson, William Link
Stars: Robert Preston, Lynn Redgrave, Patrick Macnee & Jeff Goldblum
Genres: Drama, Mystery, Thriller

00:00 Full Movie

metadata.Plot: In a theatre on Broadway, a group of friends remember the opening night from one year ago. On this night, the leading lady was apparently murdered. On this day, these people, all involved in the production, are brought back by the fiancee of this murder victim, a distinguished playwright, to read for parts in his new play. However, he believes she was murdered, and now wants to catch the killer.
metadata.Actors: Robert Preston, Lynn Redgrave, Patrick Macnee
